talk1.dialogue: Okay, that went well I think. Atleast I didn't lose all my money.
I still don't know why I agreed to go on a date with him, but it was nicer than I expected.
Fwie Fwie Fwie, how are you doing, young fellow.
What are you doing here, Corvo?
I came here to congratulate you on succesfully having your first date.
Oh, my little socially inept little fellow, growing up so fast.
I'm sorry, I'm just very proud of you. Keep going like you're doing now.
I'll be waiting for you when you finish your second date.
At this rate, you might have a shot at dating Vanessa!
Anyways, it's time for you to continue your search for love, my little fellow. Once you're ready, press W to continue.
